text: The year 589 BC was a year of the pre-Julian Roman calendar. In the Roman Empire, it was known as year 165 Ab urbe condita . The denomination 589 BC for this year has been used since the early medieval period, when the Anno Domini calendar era became the prevalent method in Europe for naming years. ==Events== * Apries succeeds his father Psamtik II as king of Egypt. * Nebuchadnezzar begins his siege of Jerusalem. ==Births== ==Deaths== * Psamtik II, king of Egypt ==References==
title: 589 BC
